root.name: . (dot)
root.description: Provides access to an object's methods and data. An object is an instance of a class and contains is a grouping of methods (object functions) and data (object variables and constants). The dot operator directs the program to the information encapsulated within an object.

parameter.label: object
parameter.description: the object you want to access

parameter.label: data
parameter.description: variable or constant encapsulated in the object
